name: Honor of Heirs
storyline: Once upon a time, a great war between descendants of the Gods and the Calamity raged on and on. Both sides spilled oceans of blood trying to obtain the Holy Grail, and yet, both failed, causing the Gods to abandon the world and let it descend into the Dark Ages.
summary:
Assemble the mightiest medieval Order and dominate the land of Avalon!
Embark on an adventure to create the most epic hero tale!
